mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(b.sno) AS totSize, b.boardtype, qb.qna_horsehead AS horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN qna_board qb ON b.sno = qb.sno WHERE m.nickname LIKE '%${findStr}%' OR b.hashtag LIKE '%${findStr}%' OR b.subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' OR b.doc LIKE '%${findStr}%' GROUP BY b.boardtype, qb.qna_horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward HAVING b.boardtype = #{boardtype}
AND qb.qna_horsehead = #{horsehead}

SELECT COUNT(b.sno) AS totSize, b.boardtype, qb.qna_horsehead AS horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN qna_board qb ON b.sno = qb.sno WHERE b.hashtag LIKE '%${hashtag}%' GROUP BY b.boardtype, qb.qna_horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward

SELECT b.sno, b.boardtype, b.nal, b.subject, b.doc, b.hashtag, b.viewcount, b.thumbup, b.thumbdown, (b.thumbup-b.thumbdown) AS thumb, board_delete, m.id, m.nickname, m.profile_img, qb.qna_horsehead AS horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward, COUNT(r.repl_sno) AS countRepl FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN repl r ON b.sno = r.sno LEFT JOIN qna_board qb ON b.sno = qb.sno WHERE b.hashtag LIKE '%${hashtag}%' GROUP BY b.sno, b.boardtype, b.nal, b.subject, b.doc, b.hashtag, b.viewcount, b.thumbup, b.thumbdown, thumb, board_delete, m.id, m.nickname, m.profile_img, qb.qna_horsehead, qb.qna_pixel_reward
ORDER BY b.nal DESC, b.sno DESC
ORDER BY thumb DESC, b.nal DESC, b.sno DESC
ORDER BY countRepl DESC, b.nal DESC, b.sno DESC
ORDER BY b.viewcount DESC, b.nal DESC, b.sno DESC
LIMIT ${startNo}, ${listSize}
SELECT sno FROM board ORDER BY sno DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(id, boardtype, nal, subject, doc, hashtag) VALUES(#{id}, #{boardtype}, NOW(), #{subject}, #{doc}, #{hashtag})
INSERT INTO qna_board(sno, qna_pixel_reward, qna_horsehead) VALUES(${sno}, ${qna_pixel_reward}, #{qna_horsehead})
